programme.title: Nightmare Tenants, Slum Landlords
programme.desc: Catching up with tenants and landlords from previous episodes, including a man living in a damp and mouldy flat, who was unable to sleep in the bedroom due to the horrendous conditions. The programme also revisits a 70-year-old landlady whose tenants stopped paying the rent for a year, and the council's Rogue Landlord Team in Lewisham, who learned where a slum property owner's reputation for a short fuse came from

programme.title: Nightmare Tenants, Slum Landlords
programme.desc: Kellie owes five months' rent, but refuses to leave unless the bailiffs arrive, while Simon wanted to sell his house post-breakup, but the tenants are still there five years later, and Arvydas is happily living in his garden shed

programme.title: Nightmare Tenants, Slum Landlords
programme.desc: A landlord seeks urgent advice from eviction specialist Chris after finding his three-bedroom terrace has been stripped bare of the fittings, the flooring, and even the grass on the lawn. Landlady Rose gets a shock when she finally gains access to her property, and Dave from Peterborough Council's housing team comes across some of the worst damp and mould he has ever seen. Plus, Selina and Lee must return from America for a court case to recover £10,000 rent arrears on their UK property

programme.title: Nightmare Tenants, Slum Landlords
programme.desc: Kate faces trouble from unruly tenants, who became anti-social, and are now trying to sue her for serving them an eviction notice. Dhiren relates how the existing tenant of a house he bought stopped paying rent as soon as he took ownership, and Tim explains how a health scare left him seeking to sell his property - but a standing occupant refused to leave

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: PC Craig Dawes attends a fatal collision involving a motorcycle and car, where he and Sgt Matt Edwards secure the site for crash investigators, who try to piece together what happened. Sgt Scott Riley spots and follows a biker he thinks looks suspicious, with a computer check indicating the bike is not licensed or insured

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: Around 11,000 automatic number plate recognition cameras continually monitor vehicles on Britain's roads. With ANPR readers installed in their patrol cars, it is a valuable tool for Derbyshire's traffic cops, helping them track down dangerous offenders and illegal cars, vans and lorries. Karl Jackson is alerted to a possible disqualified driver when a passing car triggers his ANPR system, but the vehicle fails to stop and a pursuit begins

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: PC Andy Swift is on the lookout for a high-value car stolen from a dealership after being taken for a test drive, while he also searches for builder's van taken from a driveway while the owner popped briefly inside to collect his tools and equipment. PC Dave Shaw is patrolling on a night shift when he follows a car suspected of being used in house burglary

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: PC Tom Strachan gives pursuit when a car is spotted by police cameras being driven with no insurance, but when records flag up the suspect has a history of violence, an armed response team is called in too. The suspect throws a knife out of the car and then waves a baseball bat out of his window, banging it on the roof and making offensive hand gestures at the police behind him

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: A look at incidents involving alcohol or drug abuse, with Matt Copestake is called to investigate reports of a woman suspected of drink-driving at 10am. Andy Swift is on the trail of a driver who has allegedly failed to stop after a collision and when he pulls the car over, the officer suspects the driver has been smoking cannabis

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: A reckless car thief seems intent on causing carnage, while the pursuit of an unlicensed driver through a housing estate has grave consequences. Inspector Ed Turner turns up more than he bargains for when the pursuit of a suspected heroin user takes a turn for the worse, and elsewhere officers face one of the biggest challenges of their careers when a stolen JCB goes on the rampage

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Ortis Deley follows officers from Cleveland and Durham's specialist unit as they embark on a series of operations targeting crimes connected to narcotics. From chasing down people driving under the influence of drugs to raiding cannabis factories, Sgt Kevin Salter and his crew take on the drug game's key players in the north-east of England. Showcasing all the action of one eventful night, Ortis is in the thick of it as the interceptors ultimately seize more than £500,000 of contraband

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Gordo and Dan use their Tasers to help arrest a knife-wielding teenager, Jim leads five units in the boxing in of a car suspected of carrying drugs, and Tim and Tom tackle a mouthy drunk who has crashed his van

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Gordon Morris leads a raid on the house of a suspected drug user, but the door won't budge. Meanwhile, Rich Woodward is in pursuit of a souped-up hot hatch, a late-night reveller kicks off in Nantwich town centre, and police dog Bonnie is used in the hunt for two runaways

programme.title: American Gangster (2007)
programme.desc: The story of 1970s drug kingpin Frank Lucas, whose innovative methods of smuggling heroin into the US made him one of the leading figures in the New York underworld. A detective is assigned to bring Lucas's empire down, but his investigation is undermined by police corruption. Ridley Scott's fact-based crime drama, starring Denzel Washington, Russell Crowe, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Josh Brolin

programme.title: Nightmare Tenants, Slum Landlords
programme.desc: Claire and Simon seek eviction specialist Chris's help to evict a man claiming to be renting their old family home. Plus, a man is almost £30,000 in debt and in danger of repossession after his tenants stopped paying the rent

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: The pursuit of a reckless getaway driver in a stolen car ends with a full-scale air-to-ground search for a suspect, and a battle to save his life. In Ripley, a report of a crashed car leads to the arrest of a very drunk man who, despite being found with the key in his pocket, denies any wrongdoing

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: The road crime team leads a county lines drugs crackdown in Chesterfield, capturing three suspects believed to be ferrying crack cocaine and heroin into Derbyshire on a regular basis. programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Jacko has to deal with a suspected drug dealer who seems to have found a novel way of hiding his stash, and Mark and Steve stop a suspicious man trying to hide his true identity. Meanwhile, after a high-speed pursuit, interceptor Liam hunts down a wanted teenager

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: In this special edition, Ortis Deley and Rick Edwards join police using cutting-edge technology to crack down on crime, including tiny thermal-imaging cameras, handheld fingerprint sensors and tracking drones. Ortis joins Cheshire interceptors on a thrilling motorway pursuit, while Rick and the team tackle a drug driver and officers discover a massive cannabis farm

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Cameras follow elite teams from the Durham and Cleveland forces as they tackle young, reckless drivers who cause carnage on the roads and put themselves and others in danger. Spike and dog handler Ian pursue a 20-year-old drunk driver who tries to lose them on a travellers' site, Ben goes head to head with a speeding boy racer, and Spike switches four wheels for two as he gets on his bike to catch illegal off-roaders tearing it up on the beach

programme.title: Shoplifters & Scammers: At War with the Law
programme.desc: At West Orchards in Coventry, senior officer Lewis turns detective when a stallholder reports a theft an hour after it happened. He reviews the CCTV footage, pinpoints the incident and tracks down the perpetrator outside the shopping centre. A department store calls in a suspected perfume theft, but until they can review their footage and confirm it security officer Mal keeps track of the suspect on CCTV

programme.title: Home and Away

programme.title: Home and Away

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors

programme.title: Casualty 24/7: Every Second Counts

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Jessica meets an old friend who happens to be one of the best homicide detectives in Los Angeles, and helps provide the vital clue in the case that ended his career. Starring Angela Lansbury and Barry Newman

programme.desc: A woman disrupts Cabot Cove's mayoral election campaign by claiming one of the candidates is her secret husband and the father of her five children. Jessica steps in to investigate when she is found dead. Ruth Roman guest stars

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Three people claim the body of an unidentified man who is discovered dead on a railway line in an attempt to cash in on the will. Whodunit, guest starring Bryan Cranston, with Angela Lansbury

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: An unscrupulous landlord is killed, and suspicion falls on an impoverished factory worker whose life he made hell. However, Jessica is not convinced of the woman's guilt and sets out to unmask the real killer. Guest starring Lorna Luft, alongside Angela Lansbury

programme.desc: When a murder spree in Lower Canaan, Ohio, is connected to a serial killer who was executed a year ago, the agents discover a copycat murderer is continuing his work. Drama, starring Thomas Gibson, AJ Cook and Shemar Moore

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.desc: A train is derailed after crashing into a vehicle parked on the tracks, killing 11 people. The car driver tells Fontana and Falco he only intended to commit suicide, not murder. programme.title: Columbo
programme.desc: A terrorist posing as an Irish author heads a peace organization while secretly running guns for the IRA in Belfast. When he kills an arms dealer who tried to swindle him, the writer is sure he has covered his tracks - until Columbo shambles on to the scene. Detective drama, with Peter Falk, Clive Revill, Jeanette Nolan and Bernard Behrens

programme.title: Columbo
programme.desc: A sex therapist tries to pin the blame for the murder of her unfaithful lover on her assistant, but the dishevelled detective is not convinced by the ruse and seeks to identify a mysterious woman in black who was spotted leaving the scene of the crime. Detective drama, starring Peter Falk, Lindsay Crouse, Peter Jurasik and Julia Montgomery

programme.title: Columbo
programme.desc: An inventor tries to stop his mother-in-law from exposing his infidelities by murdering her in front of a security camera - and tampering with the recording to make it look like the killing occurred at a time when he had an alibi. However, Columbo sees through his hi-tech ruse and tries to expose the truth. Crime drama, starring Peter Falk, Oskar Werner and Gena Rowlands

programme.title: Columbo
programme.desc: A wealthy man due to marry a younger woman is electrocuted in the bath. Columbo suspects the victim's identical twin nephews - a flamboyant TV chef and a conservative banker - who stand to inherit his fortune if he died unmarried, but the detective is unsure which of them is the guilty party. Drama, starring Peter Falk, and Martin Landau in a dual role. With Paul Stewart, Julie Newmar and Jeanette Nolan

programme.title: Columbo
programme.desc: The sleuth's holiday in Mexico is disrupted by a bizarre death involving a suave retired bullfighter, who has killed his best friend using one of the animals as a murder weapon - but is determined his spotless image and reputation will remain untarnished. Crime drama, starring Peter Falk, Ricardo Montalban, A Martinez and Pedro Armendariz Jr

programme.title: Columbo
programme.desc: A philandering psychiatrist, who involved his mistress in a series of hypnosis experiments, kills her husband in the heat of the moment when the pair are caught out. He persuades his distraught lover to make up a story involving two burglars, but Lt Columbo realises she is lying and goes in search of the truth. Crime drama, starring Peter Falk, George Hamilton and Lesley Warren

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The murder of a port authority officer reveals Parsa's possible whereabouts as the team continues the hunt for the terrorist intent on wiping out NCIS. Bishop reveals her past association with the quarry and suggests where she thinks he may be found, but the CIA has intercepted a call that places Parsa in a different location to Ellie's hunch. Mark Harmon and Emily Wickersham star

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman accusing a popular athlete of rape takes to a billboard to release her frustration when the investigation is stalled

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson investigates a police officer's sexual assault case, while Tucker's retirement party ends in disaster. Crime drama, starring Abby Royle and Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Special Agent Ned Dorneget of the NCIS cyber division joins the team to further their investigation into The Calling, the insidious terror network radicalising youngsters via the internet. When it emerges young suicide bomber Bradley was not, in fact, affiliated with The Calling, Gibbs and his colleagues realise they might be back to square-one. Determined to bring the organisation down, the agents pursue two new leads, an arms dealer who may be supplying The Calling with their signature German S-mines, and another boy given a deadly mission by the terrorists. Guest starring Matt Jones

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The death of Special Agent Ned Dorneget hits the team hard, and when Gibbs receives a visit from his late colleague's mother - CIA Officer Joanna Teague - he must decide whether to let her help with the investigation into the Calling. Meanwhile, Gibbs hopes his young charge Luke, formerly one of the Calling's radicalised footsoldiers, might be key to bringing the organisation down. However, when the terrorists discover where their defecting comrade has taken refuge, the abduct him and flee to Iraq. The team follows hot on their heels, but it seems Luke's ties to the Calling might be stronger than anyone at NCIS ever anticipated. Naval crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, with guest Mimi Rogers

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Lupo and Bernard investigate when a prominent charity executive is murdered - but the case unexpectedly sheds light on a major scandal, leading to a heated confrontation between McCoy and the governor of New York. Crime drama, starring Sam Waterson, Anthony Anderson and Jeremy Sisto

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Lupo and Bernard find themselves with a long list of suspects when they investigate the murder of a late-term abortion doctor in a church. The victim had been shot at and threatened on numerous occasions, and his wife is convinced the killer is a pro-life zealot. Meanwhile, Buren receives bad news, and Rubirosa faces a moral dilemma - triggering tension within the team

programme.title: Criminals: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Journalist Nick Wallis joins police forces around the nation to discover how CCTV is helping to bring criminals using weapons to justice. A CCTV operator's instincts lead him to keep an eye on a man acting suspiciously on a train station platform and who then takes a knife out of his pocket and threatens a woman coming towards him. There is also footage of a raid on a west London jewellery shop, with the gang spraying bleach in the eyes of security guards and smashing down the doors with pickaxes while the terrified staff cower inside

As the agents begin searching for a motive, Abby surprises everyone by turning up at the lab in a revealing fancy-dress costume

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team joins forces with military investigators to ascertain whether terrorists were responsible for an explosion at a golf course in which a marine colonel was killed. programme.desc: The suspicious death of a rich Iranian caviar importer the day after his wedding leads the detectives to a string of suspects, including his wife and his chief competitor in the industry. However, new light is thrown on the investigation by the discovery that the murder weapon was a pillow belonging to the businessman's daughter

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Jerry Orbach's final appearance in the crime drama. Briscoe's investigation into the killing of a delivery man uncovers the married victim's involvement in a website arranging romantic liaisons between consenting adults, and reveals the deceased's wife had recently purchased a gun

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The conviction of a death row prisoner is called into question by the revelation that attorney-client privilege may have prompted a former prosecutor to withhold evidence capable of establishing his innocence. Drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Steven Hill

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Fontana and Green are baffled by a series of flu-related deaths until they discover the victims were given bogus vaccines. McCoy sets out to prosecute the man responsible for their distribution, but a mistake by new ADA Alexandra Borgia threatens their case and leaves the rookie at odds with her boss

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A controversial talk show host is shot dead in the street and suspicion initially falls on a woman who was suing him for sexual harassment. However, later evidence leads the team to the victim's wife, who stands to inherit $20million, and a stalker who claims to be having an affair with her. Crime drama, starring Sam Waterston

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: McCoy and Borgia prosecute a famous basketball player accused of murdering a fan who had been harassing him for some time. They discover the star's fingerprints in the victim's apartment, but the evidence linking him to the crime scene is dismissed as inadmissible because the detectives cut corners to find a match on the police database. Starring Sam Waterston and Annie Parisse

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Director Jenny Shepard tries to solve the murder of an underworld source who was prepared to give information on the activities of arms dealer La Grenouille. Unfortunately her behaviour becomes increasingly obsessive as the case proceeds, leaving Gibbs wondering if her judgement is being clouded by a personal motivation. Starring Lauren Holly and Mark Harmon

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A blind man unwittingly photographs evidence of a murder, leading Jethro and the team to the corpse of a petty officer who was stabbed with a knife left at the scene. Further evidence indicates his death was not the result of a random mugging - but cracking the case proves difficult. Meanwhile, Tony has relationship problems. Drama, starring Mark Harmon

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs is made acting director while Jenny is attending an overseas conference. However, he decides to ignore his duties and investigate the murder of a man who arrived dead in a taxi at the team's headquarters with no clues to his identity - except a mysterious list of names. Drama, starring Mark Harmon and Sean Murray

programme.title: The Blacklist
programme.desc: A tragedy buried in Mossad agent Samar's past is brought to light as the task force hunt down a terrorist. Tom runs into major difficulties in his plan to clear Liz's name

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Kat crosses the line when she follows up on her suspicions about a trainer at her boxing gym. Crime drama, starring Abby Royle and Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Rollins tries to find a government worker who is withholding green cards in exchange for sex. Crime drama, starring Kelli Giddish and Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs fights for his life on board a US Navy hospital ship after being shot. Meanwhile, DiNozzo and Joanna Teague head for Shanghai, where they hope to take down the leaders of the terrorist group known as The Calling. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Mimi Rogers

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs throws himself back into his work following his near-death experience, updating his appearance and tackling a new risky case alongside DEA agent Luis Mitchell, who wants help bringing down a drugs cartel. Concerned about his colleague's apparent enthusiasm to re-enter the field, DiNozzo discovers Mitchell is the son of a former NCIS agent who gave his life trying to save Gibbs' late wife and daughter, and this attachment is causing Gibbs to break his own rule against personal involvement in a case. However, a significant danger is posed by Benson Long, the cartel's head, and Mitchell's top target

programme.title: Law & Order

There is also footage of drivers falling asleep at the wheel, overloaded vehicles and suspects caught with illegal substances - plus a host of excuses as the people pulled over try to persuade officers they have not done anything wrong

programme.title: Warehouse 13
programme.desc: Pete and Myka investigate a hockey player who has been healing miraculously from serious injuries, and suspect a fan of his is controlling him with an artefact

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam jumps into the body of an FBI agent to protect a star witness from the wrath of the Mob. Time-travelling drama, starring Scott Bakula

programme.title: Merlin
programme.desc: Morgana is tormented by dreams of Gwen becoming queen of Camelot and, encouraged by Morgause, reveals her and Arthur's courtship to Uther. When the king banishes the serving girl from the kingdom and his son resolves to follow her, Morgana frames Gwen for the crime of enchanting the prince - leaving Merlin no choice but to risk everything to save her from a gruesome death

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager
programme.desc: Part two of two. The Doctor reconsiders his decision to betray the ship and accompany his fellow holograms. Sci-fi adventure, starring Robert Picardo

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: While Higgins and TC are trying to wrangle a green card for Higgins, armed gunmen suddenly storm the building they are in and take hostages

programme.title: World's Most Evil Killers
programme.desc: The little-known case of Ronald Dominique, a serial killer and rapist who murdered at least 23 men and boys and was known as the Bayou Strangler

programme.title: Alphas
programme.desc: The Department of Defence suspects there is a Red Flag traitor among Rosen's team, and imprisons the doctor and his talented charges in a cell block designed to suppress their abilities. Under questioning, they discover Rosen's phone has been used to contact three scientists - all of whom have now been found dead, but were involved in the Alpha programme during the Cold War. Sci-fi drama, starring David Strathairn

programme.title: Snapped
programme.desc: Detectives follow the lead of a psychic's dream to the body of a missing nurse. The ensuing investigation unmasks a vengeful killer

programme.title: Murders That Shocked The Nation
programme.desc: Fred Dinenage tells the full story of the Richardson gang, the 1960s mobsters whose use of torture against their victims gave them a reputation as London's most sadistic gangsters

programme.title: Night Cops
programme.desc: Police in Crewe use their persuasive powers to calm down an excitable youth, Wrexham officers rush to the aid of a colleague in distress, and policemen in Torquay help a woman who was knocked to the ground by her boyfriend

programme.title: Road Wars
programme.desc: The Proactive Squad from Thames Valley Police uses unmarked cars with video cameras on board to give an intriguing insight into car crime and ways it can be prevented. Featuring footage of dangerous drivers on the overcrowded roads

programme.title: London's Weekend
programme.desc: A chance to catch up on the week's headlines and a taste of what to see and do in London this weekend.

programme.title: Cat Hospital
programme.desc: A prize-winning Maine Coon needs a new home as it is feeling stressed out living in such a large group of other cast, so Clare tries to help owner Claudia find a suitable one

programme.title: Danger Dogs
programme.desc: Documentary following dogs and their trainers as they are put through their paces in everything from sniffing out drugs to finding roadside bombs in conflict zones

programme.title: Top Tens of Warfare
programme.desc: An insight into the 20th century's most significant ships, submarines and other naval vessels, featuring the likes of the German U-Boat, the Nimitz Aircraft Carriers and D-Day's landing craft

programme.title: The Prisoner
programme.desc: Number Six becomes a pawn in a human game of chess while trying to recruit an army of like-minded souls - and learns to judge the Villagers' allegiances by their moves. Cult drama, starring Patrick McGoohan

programme.title: Cat Hospital
programme.desc: Cat-catchers Maggie and Jim attempt to round-up a colony of farm cats. However, the task proves harder than they imagined. Harley comes to the hospital for routine check-up, but Claire discovers a murmur. Elsewhere, Martina searches for an effective stress relief for her cat

programme.title: Wild Britain with Ray Mears
programme.desc: The survival expert explores Skomer Island, a seabird haven off the Pembrokeshire coast, and watches members of its puffin population returning from the sea with sand eels to feed their young. He also has a close encounter with the Skomer vole, which is not found anywhere else

programme.title: Hobson's Choice (1953)
programme.desc: A cantankerous, overbearing boot-maker spends most of his time drinking while his three daughters push themselves to the limit taking care of his shop and home. A timid employee marries one of the sisters, then sets himself up as a rival for his business. Comedy, starring John Mills and Charles Laughton

programme.title: Odd Man Out (1947)
programme.desc: An IRA operative stages a robbery to steal funds for his cause, but as he makes his getaway he is wounded by the police and forced to go on the run. Staggering through the backstreets of Belfast, the fugitive encounters a succession of people either willing to help him - or determined to turn him in. Carol Reed's thriller, based on the book by FL Green, with James Mason, Robert Newton and Kathleen Ryan

programme.title: On the Fiddle (1961)
programme.desc: A Second World War black marketeer is arrested, but a judge forces him to join the army rather than sending him to prison. He soon finds a willing accomplice in an easy-going fellow recruit, and together they concoct a variety of underhanded schemes to avoid being sent to the front line. Comedy based on RF Delderfield's novel, starring Alfred Lynch and Sean Connery

programme.title: The King and Four Queens (1956)
programme.desc: A gambler visits a ranch owned by the mother of four infamous outlaw brothers. He hopes to discover the location of buried treasure stolen by the criminal family, but finds himself fending off the advances of the bandits' seductive wives, all of whom hope to escape their absent husbands and make off with the loot. Western, with Clark Gable, Eleanor Parker and Jo Van Fleet

programme.title: The World's Most Incredible Hotels
programme.desc: The most extraordinary, iconic, and luxurious hotels ever built, taking in 26 destinations across 18 countries

programme.title: The Lion Queen
programme.desc: The work of Andi Rive, who abandoned her city life to run a lion sanctuary in South Africa and raise awareness about a species that is facing extinction

programme.title: Peeping Tom (1960)
programme.desc: The son of a psychologist develops a fetish for murdering women and recording their final death throes on film, a twisted and gruesome version of his father's own voyeuristic experiments in which he recorded his son obsessively throughout every moment of his childhood. Michael Powell's psychological thriller, starring Carl Boehm, Anna Massey, Moira Shearer, Esmond Knight and Maxine Audley

programme.title: Let Him Have It (1991)
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about the controversial 1952 murder trial in which 19-year-old Derek Bentley was sentenced to be hanged for killing a policeman - even though his friend Chris Craig was the one who fired the fatal gunshot. Starring Christopher Eccleston, Paul Reynolds, Tom Courtenay, Eileen Atkins, Tom Bell and Mark McGann

programme.title: Song for a Raggy Boy (2003)
programme.desc: A widower is hired to teach at a strict Catholic reformatory school, but the harsh regime soon fires his anger, leading to a series of confrontations with the heavy-handed priests in charge of the establishment. Fact-based drama set in 1939, starring Aidan Quinn, Iain Glen, Marc Warren and Dudley Sutton

programme.title: News Rewind
programme.desc: A digest of news and events from across London from the past few days.

programme.title: Talking Points
programme.desc: 'Current affairs affecting Londoners today and a look at the latest shows and films in the capital.

programme.title: London's Weekend
programme.desc: A chance to catch up on the week's headlines and a taste of what to see and do in London this weekend.

programme.title: Cat Hospital
programme.desc: Animal lover Eilish has been feeding the stray cats in her garden during lockdown, and contacts the clinic when she notices the health of one of them is beginning to deteriorate

programme.title: Danger Dogs
programme.desc: Documentary following dogs and their trainers as they are put through their paces in everything from sniffing out drugs to finding roadside bombs in conflict zones

programme.title: Europe's Wilderness
programme.desc: A journey of discovery, to a wonderful world of breath-taking views and endangered species with each episode focusing on one animal and its lifestyle, needs and habitat

programme.title: The World's Most Incredible Hotels
programme.desc: The most extraordinary, iconic, and luxurious hotels ever built, taking in 26 destinations across 18 countries

programme.title: Secrets of London with Mark Monroe
programme.desc: This special extended episode shows what goes into the production of London's newest electric taxi

programme.title: A Kiss Before Dying (1956)
programme.desc: A psychopathic college student is horrified to learn his girlfriend is pregnant, threatening his chances of being accepted into her well-to-do family. In a fit of fury, he murders her and makes it look as if she had committed suicide - only for her sister to show up, taking an uncomfortable degree of interest in the manner of her sibling's death. Thriller, with Robert Wagner, Joanne Woodward, Jeffrey Hunter and Mary Astor

programme.title: The 14 (1973)
programme.desc: A mother of 14 falls ill, and her children struggle to support the family themselves. Drama, starring Jack Wild, Alun Armstrong and June Brown

programme.title: Tarka the Otter (1978)
programme.desc: A mischievous otter faces a fight for survival in the wild from birth, as it leaves the nest and strikes out alone. Wildlife adventure based in Henry Williamson's novel, narrated by Peter Ustinov and starring Peter Bennett, Edward Underdown and Brenda Cavendish

programme.title: Dance With Me, Henry (1956)
programme.desc: The owners of a struggling amusement park get mixed up with the Mob as one struggles to pay his debts and the other faces losing his adopted kids. Comedy, with Abbott and Costello

programme.title: Tabernacle Choir: Music and Words
programme.desc: Music and inspiration for everyday living from one of the world's most acclaimed choirs featuring regular guest artists

programme.title: My Greek Odyssey
programme.desc: A journey through some of the most spectacular and unique Greek islands, exploring the rich culture, history and food of Greece while meeting the locals and those who live there

programme.title: The Avengers
programme.desc: Steed and Mrs Peel investigate a mysterious series of sudden deaths in the world of high finance, and encounter a cartel of crooked stockbrokers. Light-hearted drama, with Patrick Macnee, Diana Rigg and guest star Peter Bowles

programme.title: When Missing Turns to Murder
programme.desc: Series in which families reveal the moment their lives changed forever - when they were told their missing loved ones had been murdered

programme.title: Eden Lake (2008)
programme.desc: A couple on a romantic break find their peace shattered by a gang of youths who steal their belongings and vandalise their car. However, when they confront the youngsters they are subjected to a horrific attack, resulting in a deadly game of cat and mouse through the woodland. Horror, starring Kelly Reilly and Michael Fassbender

programme.title: Detachment (2011)
programme.desc: A substitute teacher drifts from school to school, actively trying to avoid making emotional connections with either colleagues or pupils. When he takes a placement at a school with an apathetic student body and a frustrated administration, he finds himself becoming an unlikely role model. Drama, starring Adrien Brody, Marcia Gay Harden and James Caan

programme.title: Relentless (2020)
programme.desc: An ex-convict must stay out of trouble for one more day to secure his freedom - but must choose between his principles and his future when he comes to the aid of a prostitute under threat from a gang. Action thriller, starring Steven Murphy and Tiffany-Ellen Robinson

Fact-based period drama, starring Denholm Elliott and Holly Aird

programme.desc: A drunken, out-of-work father writes to the family he abandoned 23 years before to say he wants to come home and ask their forgiveness. Comedy, starring Denholm Elliott, Julie Walters, Richard E Grant and Anna Massey
